attributes.review: Just absolutely terrible the app took hours to download and keeps glitching whenever I use it and this never happens with any other app that I use! Defiantly do not recommend👎

I would rather die than vote for Trump again! WORST PRESIDENT EVER 😡😡😡😡

attributes.review: Worst App ever don’t recommend. Once I open the app this big orange guy came on the screen and gave my sister a heart attack and she had to go to the hospital. Now she’s in a coma and probably scarred for life! So thanks a lot Apple for letting this app on your store.
